Title: Night Court
Resume: An eccentric fun-loving judge presides over an urban night court and all the silliness going on there.

Title: Rick and Morty
Resume: An animated series that follows the exploits of a super scientist and his not-so-bright grandson.

Title: Community
Resume: A suspended lawyer is forced to enroll in a community college with an eccentric staff and student body.

Title: Bojack Horseman
Resume: BoJack Horseman was the star of the hit television show "Horsin' Around" in the '80s and '90s, but now he's washed up, living in Hollywood, complaining about everything, and wearing colorful sweaters.

Title: Arrested Development
Resume: Level-headed son Michael Bluth takes over family affairs after his father is imprisoned. But the rest of his spoiled, dysfunctional family are making his job unbearable.

Title: Insecure
Resume: Follows the awkward experiences and racy tribulations of a modern-day African-American woman.

Title: The Simpsons
Resume: The satiric adventures of a working-class family in the misfit city of Springfield.

Title: Gravity Falls
Resume: Twin siblings Dipper and Mabel Pines spend the summer at their great-uncle's tourist trap in the enigmatic Gravity Falls, Oregon.

Title: Freaks And Geeks
Resume: A high school mathlete starts hanging out with a group of burnouts while her younger brother navigates his freshman year.

Title: The Office
Resume: A mockumentary on a group of typical office workers, where the workday consists of ego clashes, inappropriate behavior, and tedium.

Title: Parks And Recreation
Resume: The absurd antics of an Indiana town's public officials as they pursue sundry projects to make their city a better place.

Title: South Park
Resume: Follows the misadventures of four irreverent grade-schoolers in the quiet, dysfunctional town of South Park, Colorado.

Title: Baskets
Resume: An eccentric fun-loving judge presides over an urban night court and all the silliness going on there.

Title: Friends
Resume: Follows the personal and professional lives of six twenty to thirty-something-year-old friends living in Manhattan.

Title: The Big Bang Theory
Resume: A woman who moves into an apartment across the hall from two brilliant but socially awkward physicists shows them how little they know about life outside of the laboratory.

Title: Seinfeld
Resume: The continuing misadventures of neurotic New York City stand-up comedian Jerry Seinfeld and his equally neurotic New York City friends.

Title: Curb Your Enthusiasm
Resume: The life and times of Larry David and the predicaments he gets himself into with his friends and complete strangers.

Title: The Marvelous Mrs. Maisel
Resume: A housewife in 1958 decides to become a stand-up comic.

Title: Derry Girls
Resume: The personal exploits of a 16-year-old girl and her family and friends during the Troubles in the early 1990s.

Title: It's Always Sunny in Philadelphia
Resume: Five friends with big egos and small brains are the proprietors of an Irish pub in Philadelphia.
